headline: Big greenhouse gas state taking biggest climate step yet
author: MARC LEVY - Associated Press
sentences: North fatally shot Mubarak Soulemane in January 2020 as Soulemane sat in the driverâ€™s seat of a car in West Haven, where a high-speed chase ended and police boxed in the car.
Officials say North posted $50,000 bail, was placed on paid administrative leave and his police powers were suspended.
Authorities say Trooper Brian North turned himself in to the state inspector general Tuesday evening.
A Connecticut state trooper has been charged with manslaughter in the 2020 fatal shooting of a man.
The inspector general's office released a report Wednesday saying the shooting was not justified.
North told officials he feared Soulemane was going to attack other officers with a knife.
